msg

すまん。見回り任務のことじゃないんだが……手伝ってもらいたいことがあるんだ。

Sorry. I'm not talking about patrol duty, but I need some help with .......
msg
It's about Seele…Her wounds get a bit injured, which might also worsen the heat beyond the reason of Honkai.
是关于希儿的事情…她身上的擦伤已经有些感染了，热度除了崩坏能的侵蚀之外可能也有外伤感染所致。
ゼーレのことだ……傷口から感染症に罹っている。彼女の熱は崩壊エネルギーの侵蝕だけじゃなく、外傷感染によるものなのかもしれない。
제레 이야기야... 상처로 인해 감염증에 걸렸어. 그녀의 열은 붕괴 에너지의 침식뿐만 아니라 외상 감염 때문일지도 몰라.
It's about Hill...the scrapes on her body have become somewhat infected, and the heat may have been caused by traumatic infection in addition to the erosion of the avalanche energy.
It's Seele. ...... She has an infection from a wound. Her fever may be due to a traumatic infection, not just the erosion of decay energy.
msg
Even I can't treat Honkai, but I still want to help.
虽然崩坏能的感染我无法治疗，但我还是希望能帮到她一些。
崩壊エネルギーの浸蝕は私には治せないが、それでも彼女を助けてやりたいんだ。
붕괴 에너지의 침식은 내가 고칠 수 없지만, 그래도 그녀를 도와주고 싶다.
Although I can't cure the infection of collapse energy, I still hope to help her somehow.
I can't cure the erosion of the disintegrating energy, but I still want to help her.
msg
It's a shame…that I don't have some essential medicine as a paramedic. They were all used in the preivous fights, even bandages……
说来惭愧…作为医护员身边却连一些基本的药物都没有。在之前的战斗中储备的药物已经全部用完了，就连包扎用的绷带也……
こんなこと言うのは恥ずかしいんだが……衛生兵なのに手元には基本的な薬すらないんだ。蓄えていた薬も、これまでの戦いで全て使いきっちまった。傷口を縛る包帯すらな……。
이런 말 하기 부끄럽지만…… 위생병인데 손에 잡히는 기본적인 약조차 없어. 비축해둔 약도 지금까지의 전투에서 모두 다 써버렸어. 상처를 묶을 붕대조차…….
I'm ashamed to say...as a medic around but even some basic drugs are not available. In the previous battle reserve of drugs have all been used up, even bandages used to dress ......

I'm embarrassed to say this, but I'm a ...... medic and I don't even have basic meds on hand. All the medicines I had in stock have been used up so far in the battle. Not even bandages to bind my wounds. ......
portraits
msg
Ah haha…I can do nothing but just make trouble. Even Himeko has something wrong I can just watch.
啊哈哈…明明什么也做不了却非要跑过来添乱。就算姬子有什么三长两短我也只能在一旁袖手旁观而已。
アハハ……何もできないって分かっているのに、無理やりついて来て迷惑かけて……姫子に万一のことがあっても、私は手をこまねいて見ていることしかできないんだ。
아하하…… 아무것도 못 한다는 걸 알면서 억지로 따라와서 폐를 끼치고…… 히메코에게 만일의 일이 생겨도, 나는 손을 놓고 지켜보는 것밖에 할 수 없어.
Ahahaha...obviously can not do anything but have to come over to add to the chaos. Even if Himeko has any shortcomings I can only stand by and watch.
Hahaha......I know I can't do anything, but I'm forced to follow you and bother you......I can only sit on my hands and watch if something should happen to Himeko.
choice
Don't feel frustrated, I will try my best.
不要沮丧，有什么事情我一定尽力。
悲しまないで。何かあれば力になるから。
슬퍼하지 마. 뭐가 있으면 힘이 되어 줄 테니까.
Without you Himeko won't hold on until now.
如果没有你姬子也撑不到现在。
エミザがいなきゃ、姫子もここまで持たなかった。
에미자가 없었으면, 히메코도 여기까지 버티지 못했을 거야.
nop

Well, you're right, although the cure can not collapse caused is damage, but if it is an ordinary wound can still find a way to deal with.
Oh, thank you. I can't fix the wounds from the collapse, but I think I can manage to take care of some of the more common ones.
msg
For Seele now, there's a chance to wake up as long as her pain can be reduced, we can't give up!

For the current Hill, as long as it can help her to reduce some of the pain have the hope of waking up again, can not just give up!
If we can alleviate the pain from Seele now, he may wake up again. There is hope! We can't just give up like this!

Even Himeko can hold on for so long, so as Seele!
连姬子那个疯女人都能坚持这么久，希儿一定可以的！

히메코 그 미친 년도 여기까지 견뎌내고 있는데, 제레라면 분명 괜찮을 거야!

msg
Now we're in the area named "University Beach", where most staff of the city live here, so there're some clinics here as well.
目前我们所处的区域是名为“学海之滨”的学园都市生活区，学园都市的大部分工作人员都生活在这个区域，所以这里也有一些小诊所开设在这里。
今、私たちがいるエリアは「知識の浜」っていう学園都市の居住エリアだ。学園都市の社会人のほとんどは、このエリアで暮らしていた。だから、この近辺には小さな診療所がいくつかあってな。
지금 우리가 있는 에리어는 「지식의 해변」라는 학원 도시의 주거 에리어야. 학원 도시의 사회인 대부분은 이 에리어에서 살고 있었어. 그래서 이 근처에는 작은 진료소가 몇 군데 있어.
The area we are currently located in is the Gakuen City living area called "Gakuen Sea Shore", where most of the staff of Gakuen City live, so there are some small clinics in this area.

The area we are in now is called the "Beach of Knowledge," which is a residential area of the school city. Most of the working people in the city used to live in this area. That's why there are several small clinics in this neighborhood.
msg
I know one very close, where we can find some medicine, so I want you to take me there.
我知道这附近有一家诊所离这里很近，在那里可以找到一些实用的药物，所以我想让你带我过去。
この近くに診療所があったはずだ。そこなら役に立つ薬が見つかるだろう。九霄には、私をそこまで連れて行ってほしい。
이 근처에 진료소가 있었을 거야. 거기면 유용한 약을 찾을 수 있을 거야. 큐쇼에게는 나를 그곳까지 데려가 달라고 하고 싶어.
I know of a clinic near here where I can find some practical medication, so I'd like you to take me there.
There must be a clinic nearby. I am sure I can find some useful medicine there. I want Kyuushou to take me there.

安心しろ、姫子の言いつけは守るし、このピースの境目は覚えてる。その診療所はここから遠くもないしな。通りを1本越えれば着くはずだ。

msg
You know what? Actually Nagazora and the Academic city have been destructed before the big Honkai, all because of Raiden Mei, that Herrscher……
你知道么？其实大崩坏爆发之前长空市和这座学园都市就已经被崩坏摧毁了，而那个罪魁祸首就是雷电芽衣，是那个律者毁掉了这一切……
知ってるか？実は大崩壊が発生する前、長空市とこの学園都市は既に崩壊によって破壊されていたんだ。しかも、その元凶こそが雷電芽衣——あの律者が全てを壊したんだよ……。
알고 있어? 사실 대붕괴가 발생하기 전, 장공시와 이 학원 도시는 이미 붕괴로 인해 파괴되고 있었어. 게다가 그 원흉이 바로 라이덴메이——그 율자가 모든 것을 부숴버린 거야…….

Do you know? In fact, before the outbreak of the great collapse of the city and this school city has been destroyed by the collapse, and that the culprit is Raiden Meiko, is that the Ruler destroyed all this ......

Well, let's not talk about that, let's hurry up and go, there are a lot of avalanche creatures here, we have to be more careful, the escort job is on you.

See the phone booth in front of you! It has the marker Himeko gave me tied to it! That phone booth is the borderline!
See that phone booth up ahead? That's where the marker Himeko gave us is marked! In other words, if you cross that phone booth, that's the boundary line!
I will throw a grenade to the border! And I say three two one! We all hide behind the telephone booth!
我一会朝边界线扔一颗手雷！然后喊三二一！我们藏到电话亭后面！
境界線の方に手榴弾を投げて、三つ数える！そしたら電話ボックスの裏に隠れるんだ！
경계선 쪽으로 수류탄을 던지고, 셋을 세! 그런 다음 전화 박스 뒤에 숨는 거야!
I'll throw a grenade at the borderline in a minute! Then shout three, two, one! We hide behind the phone booth!
Throw a grenade towards the perimeter and count to three! Then hide behind the phone booth!
ドォオオオオオオォンッ！

Huh…huh……so I was right, no matter us or Honkai creatures, will be distorted to other space if crossing the border, so they won't come back……

はぁ……んくっ……どうやら、思った通りだったようだ。崩壊生物も境界を跨いだら、歪曲された他のエリアに行っちゃうんだよ。これであいつらは戻って来れない……。
하아…… 으흑…… 역시 생각한 대로였던 것 같아. 붕괴 생물도 경계를 넘어서면 왜곡된 다른 영역으로 가 버리는 거야. 이제 그 놈들은 돌아올 수 없어…….
Phew...phew ...... looks like I was right, whether it's us or the collapsing creatures, as long as they step over the border they will be distorted to other areas so they can't come back ......
Huh ...... nkk ...... Apparently, I was right. Once the disintegrating organisms cross the boundary, they'll go to another area where they've been distorted. Now those guys can't come back .......

1301: I'm more confident about my physical strength after so many fight…but still.
